desc: InsertClause is a transformation method which inserts entity description for head and tail entity

examples.ori: Shanghai is in the east of China.
examples.trans: Shanghai which is a municipality of China is in the east of China established in Tiananmen .

examples.ori: Trump is the president of the United States.
examples.trans: Trump who was born in Jamaica Hospital is the president of the United States which is a sovereign state in North America .
